name: ProgressBar
description: A UI element that represents a progress bar for displaying progress from 0% to 100%.

instanceFields.label: Title
instanceFields.description: The title text displayed on the progress bar.

instanceFields.label: Value
instanceFields.description: The current value of the progress bar (0-100).

instanceFields.label: LowValue
instanceFields.description: The minimum value of the progress bar (default: 0).

instanceFields.label: HighValue
instanceFields.description: The maximum value of the progress bar (default: 100).

instanceMethods.label: OnValueChanged
instanceMethods.description: Sets the method to be called when the progress bar value changes.

parameters.name: valueChangedEvent
parameters.description: Method that will be called with the new value as parameter

instanceMethods.label: SetValueWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the value of the progress bar without triggering any change events.

instanceMethods.label: GetPercentage
instanceMethods.description: Gets the current progress as a percentage (0-100).
